info.value: Opening our eyes in the morning, we must tell ourselves, "Today is the best day of all days!" No matter what happened yesterday, it is all in the past and there is no way to change it. Don't let yesterday's troubles influence today's good mood! While beginning work each day, no matter how busy or under pressure we are, we shouldn't complain and we shouldn't let our mood be affected. A cry is just for a day, and so is a laugh. So why then shouldn't we maintain our best mood to get through each day?
